title: Gore & Bones Sounds
description: 412 high-quality and realistic sounds of carnage, flesh cutting, skull crushing and others.
longDescription:
🎧Preview(Youtube)(1st part)

🎧Preview(Youtube)(2nd part)

🎧Preview(SoundCloud)

📃List of sounds

It is impossible to imagine any game without high-quality sound. Every movement and event should be accompanied by sounds that add depth and soul to your projects. TIRIF Studio specializes in the development of high-quality and diverse sounds for any kind and genre of projects.


You can also purchase this asset in a bundle with other suitable assets - Medieval Fighting Sounds Bundle


In this asset you will find 412 high quality sounds of:

  • Blood(Bowel, Bowel_Weapon, Gurgle, Splatter(Concrete, Long, Short), Spray, Squelch)
  • Body(Fall, Guts_Drop, Limb(Chop, Tear))
  • Bone(Click, Crack, Dislocate, Fragment, Neck_Break)
  • Generic(Bash, Chop, Flesh, Hit, Projectile(Multi, Single), Slice, Stab(Large,Small), Throat_Cut)
  • Head(Behead, Behead_Weapon, Crush, Explode, Hack(Blood, Dry))
  • Weapon(Arrow_Whistle_Impact_Gore/Whoosh_Impact_Gore, Axe_Large_Whoosh_Impact_Gore/Small_Whoosh_Impact_Gore, Hammer_Large_Whoosh_Impact_Gore/Small_Whoosh_Impact_Gore, Knife_Slice_Gore/Stab_Gore/Throwing_Gore, Spear_Stab_Gore/Throwing_Gore, Sword_Chop_Gore/Sword_Stab_Gore)


Important:

 ● Please leave a review if you bought our product

 ● Feel free to ask any question

 ● There is no exclusive license, you can use our sounds in your commercial games
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 412

Number of Audio Cues: 412

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 17:38

Supported Development Platforms:

 Windows: Yes

 Mac: Yes
